solution_line_template: There are {green_multiplier} times as many green balls as blue balls so green balls = blue balls * {green_multiplier}. Green balls = {num_blue_balls} blue balls * {green_multiplier} = <<{num_blue_balls}*{green_multiplier}={num_green_balls}>>{num_green_balls} green balls

There are {yellow_multiplier} times as many yellow balls as red ones so yellow balls = red balls * {yellow_multiplier}. Yellow balls = {num_red_balls} red balls * {yellow_multiplier} = <<{num_red_balls}*{yellow_multiplier}={num_yellow_balls}>>{num_yellow_balls} yellow balls

The total number of all the balls is {num_blue_balls} blue + {num_red_balls} red + {num_green_balls} green + {num_yellow_balls} yellow: {num_blue_balls}+{num_red_balls}+{num_green_balls}+{num_yellow_balls} = <<{num_blue_balls}+{num_red_balls}+{num_green_balls}+{num_yellow_balls}={total_balls}>>{total_balls} balls
